A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie is amazingly BAD! This is NOT a Star Wars movie\, it is a JOKE! Every single aspect of the Mytology is destroyed for NO REASON\, there are PLOT HOLES everywhere\, there is a very evident feminist agenda\, absurdity everywhere\, misplaced humor\, the characters are NOT well developed\, and the movie does not go anywhere. It is really bad.
